value_proposition.summary: Positions itself as a modern, reputable energy group where you help build a 100% green and safe energy ecosystem across several countries, backed by Top Employer recognition and a competitive, modern benefits package.

purpose_impact.summary: Frames work as contributing directly to the green transition and a safe, reliable energy system, emphasising projects of national importance, regional operations in five countries and ambitious renewable capacity targets for 2030.

target_talent_profile.summary: Targets a broad spectrum of professionals with a clear focus on engineering and IT, but also finance, legal and business support roles, inviting both experienced specialists and those starting or reshaping their careers in the energy sector.

company_culture.summary: Describes an international community of 4600+ colleagues with a friendly, diverse and inclusive environment, hybrid 3+2 work model, flexible hours, strong attention to physical and emotional well-being and a clearly explained, step-by-step recruitment process.

learning_possibilities.summary: Highlights extensive learning and professional development programs, opportunities to move between engineering, IT, finance, legal and other fields, and positions the complexity of energy law and green energy projects as a high-level learning environment in itself.
